arts.ttl: Millwall boss left to rue lapses of concentration in 2-0 defeat to Bristol City
arts.sum: “The corner comes in, we don’t deal with the second ball, they land it, square it and score the goal. They stayed in a different position but, credit to the players for the first half, I didn’t think we were great but we got to half-time.

arts.ttl: Millwall club record signing set to sidelined until April with injury sustained in Crystal Palace tie
arts.sum: He rolled his ankle in what looked like a painful moment and now Neil has confirmed that he is set for a period on the sidelines. Millwall head coach Alex Neil has confirmed that Camiel Neghli will miss the next six weeks with an ankle ligament injury.

arts.ttl: Bristol City player ratings as Robins secure first away win of 2025 vs Millwall
arts.sum: The Bristol City stopper didn't have an awful lot of work to do in the opening period, but on the rare occasion he was called into action he was solid enough. He's had to wait a long time for another Bristol City goal but not even Zak Vyner could miss from that sort of range.

arts.ttl: Millwall fans applaud in apparent support of Roberts after Mateta foul
arts.sum: Millwall fans conducted a minute's applause in an apparent show of support for goalkeeper Liam Roberts after his red-card challenge on Jean-Philippe Mateta.

arts.ttl: Millwall fans pay tribute to goalkeeper in same minute he injured Jean-Philippe Mateta
arts.sum: Sections of the crowd applauded in the eighth minute of Millwall's match against Bristol City - the same minute in which goalkeeper Liam Roberts was sent off against Crystal Palace

arts.ttl: Bristol City win at Millwall to close on play-offs
arts.sum: Goals from Zak Vyner and Harry Cornick ended Bristol City's winless run on the road as they sank Millwall 2-0.

arts.ttl: Bristol City earn overdue away win at Millwall
arts.sum: Zak Vyner and Harry Cornick scored the goals as Millwall fans showed support for controversial goalkeeper Liam Roberts.

arts.ttl: Former Bristol City, Sunderland and Hibernian manager set to take over at struggling Lommel
arts.sum: Sven Claes is reporting that Lommel are set to appoint Lee Johnson as their new head coach. The club, who are part of the City Group, are in a relegation…

arts.ttl: Bristol City predicted team vs Millwall as Manning's Reds look to end nine-game winless away run
arts.sum: Liam Manning's side will have enjoyed the rare break in their fixture schedule given the sheer amount of football they've played since the festive period, but that free weekend would have been made even sweeter by their win over Middlesbrough last time out . Cam Pring is again fit and available having returned from the bench against Middlesbrough last time out while both Haydon Roberts and Elijah Morrison are also candidates to start on that flank.

arts.ttl: Six Premier League clubs eyeing new Millwall star
arts.sum: Millwall attacking midfielder Ra’ees Bangura-Williams is being tracked by as many as six Premier League clubs, according to… The post Six Premier League clubs eyeing new Millwall star appeared first on The72 - Football League News.
